q: `` In addition to creating the jobs of the future, clean energy benefits the U.S. economy by ultimately making energy costs more affordable for consumers- especially if their dollars stay in America,'' Sergio Marchionne said. Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint, and we are excited to partner with the EPA to push forward on this track. EPA's hydraulic hybrid technology, developed in the agency's lab in Ann Arbor is coming into use in large delivery and refuse trucks across the country. The hydraulic hybrid system captures and reuses the energy

The resolution said those responsible for crimes against U.N. personnel and civilians must be held accountable. It also warned of the council's readiness to impose measures, including targeted sanctions against those who obstruct the work of UNOCI. Alassane Ouattara is widely recognized by Western and African governments as president-elect of Ivory Coast after the electoral commission proclaimed him winner of the November 28 presidential poll.
